titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale University Corporation 1985 Presidential Search Committee Records
Yale University Corporation 1985 Presidential Search Committee Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:21

did.unittitle: Yale University Corporation 1985 Presidential Search Committee records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of materials created during Yale's 1985 presidential search.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 1-B (YRG 1-B), Records of Yale Corporation committees.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the President's Office, 1986.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: 1985 Presidential Search Committee of the Yale University Corporation Records (RU 33). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of materials created during Yale's 1985 presidential search.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

controlaccess.subject: College presidents
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University -- Presidents -- Selection and appointment
